docs.text: Welcome to Tomato ← Welcome to Tomato Radio Automation! Features ← Why Named Tomato? ← Simply said, this software was named after my cat, Tomato... or more affectionately nicknamed Kitty, Tomatillo, The "Shink", Catly, Catniss Evercat, Mr. Annoying, and Kitty Poopoo. His breed: domestic street urchin. Tomato with his favorite mug. What's Next? ←
docs.title: Intro
